d.name: v2.1.0
d.body:
## Important

- Fix [CVE-2026-2359](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2026-2359) ([GHSA-v52c-386h-88mc](https://github.com/expressjs/multer/security/advisories/GHSA-v52c-386h-88mc))
- Fix [CVE-2026-3304](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2026-3304) ([GHSA-xf7r-hgr6-v32p](https://github.com/expressjs/multer/security/advisories/GHSA-xf7r-hgr6-v32p))

## What's Changed
* chore: add funding to package.json by @bjohansebas in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1346
* chore: drop mkdirp dependency by @wojtekmaj in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1350
* chore: drop object-assign dependency by @wojtekmaj in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1351
* chore: drop xtend dependency by @wojtekmaj in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1352
* chore(gitignore): ignore .nyc_output directory by @ShubhamOulkar in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1332
* Fix typo in README-vi.md regarding file upload by @Kunniii in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1366
* Fix typo in README-pt-br.md for array method by @matheushbm192 in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1367
* headers-support-utf8 by @Doc999tor in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1210
* Add Turkish translation (README-tr.md) by @Sabandogan in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1360
* Release: 2.1.0 by @UlisesGascon in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1371

## New Contributors
* @wojtekmaj made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1350
* @ShubhamOulkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1332
* @Kunniii made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1366
* @matheushbm192 made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1367
* @Doc999tor made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1210
* @Sabandogan made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1360

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/expressjs/multer/compare/v2.0.2...v2.1.0

d.name: v2.0.1
d.body:
## Important

-  Fix [CVE-2025-48997](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-48997) ([GHSA-g5hg-p3ph-g8qg](https://github.com/expressjs/multer/security/advisories/GHSA-g5hg-p3ph-g8qg))

## What's Changed
* add Arabic translation for README ..  by @3imed-jaberi in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/762
* Update README.md to fix issue #1114 by @Mohamed-Abdelfattah in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1169
* Improved documentation translation to Spanish by @juliomontenegro in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1174
* Translated to french by @AlanLg in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1182
* Improve the Brazilian Portuguese translation by @vitorRibeiro7 in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1204
* doc: uzbek language by @eugene0928 in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1232
* Fix a mistake with README-pt-br.md by @Igor-CA in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1251
* Update in Readme-pt-br and fix in Readme-ko by @carlosstenzel in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1252
* chore: add support for OSSF scorecard reporting by @inigomarquinez in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1260
* ci: replace travis with github action by @inigomarquinez in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1259
* docs: improve readability by @Sreejit-Sengupto in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1255
* test: add test for out-of-band error event by @LinusU in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1294
* chore: upgrade scorecard workflow pinned action versions by @carpasse in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1290
* Documentation: remove unfortunate abbreviation from readme by @MaddyGuthridge in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1299
* ci: use `ubuntu-latest` as default runner by @UlisesGascon in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1308
* ci: add CodeQL (SAST) by @bjohansebas in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1289
* Update readme badges by @bjohansebas in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1268
* 📝 fix changelog information by @ctcpip in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1316
* master -> v2 by @ctcpip in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1317
* chore: fix typo by @saucecodee in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/993
* Remove --save from README by @username1001 in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/929
* feat - update link badge in docs by @carlosstenzel in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1273
* ci: change branch reference by @UlisesGascon in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1319
* ♻️ use version tag for CI, fix CI badge, fix references to master/main by @ctcpip in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1324
* deps: update dependencies to latest versions by @bjohansebas in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1328
* 📝 list languages in table to prevent GH right-aligning list due to RTL language by @ctcpip in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1325
* [StepSecurity] Apply security best practices by @step-security-bot in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1311

## New Contributors
* @3imed-jaberi made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/762
* @Mohamed-Abdelfattah made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1169
* @juliomontenegro made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1174
* @AlanLg made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1182
* @vitorRibeiro7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1204
* @eugene0928 made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1232
* @Igor-CA made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1251
* @inigomarquinez made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1260
* @Sreejit-Sengupto made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1255
* @carpasse made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1290
* @MaddyGuthridge made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1299
* @saucecodee made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/993
* @username1001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/929
* @step-security-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/expressjs/multer/pull/1311

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/expressjs/multer/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

d.name: v2.0.0
d.body:
## Important

- **Breaking change: The minimum supported Node version is now 10.16.0**
- Fix [CVE-2025-47935](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-47935) ([GHSA-44fp-w29j-9vj5](https://github.com/expressjs/multer/security/advisories/GHSA-44fp-w29j-9vj5))
- Fix [CVE-2025-47944](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-47944) ([GHSA-4pg4-qvpc-4q3h](https://github.com/expressjs/multer/security/advisories/GHSA-4pg4-qvpc-4q3h))


## What's Changed

- 🐛 drain stream. fixes regression in node 18, remove old CI, set minimum node version, fix readme badges, add .npmrc
- fix: handle two busboy error events
- ♻️ fully drain stream  
- 🥅 explicitly handle req error  
- 🚨 lint:fix
- ⬆️ bump mocha
- docs: include release 2.0.0 details
